content: mama and baby turtle memory game by crochet by coraggio designs materials 3 75 mm f 4mm 4 25mm g 5mm h hooks worsted weight yarn i used red heart super saver in black brown light green dark green and 9 different colors for memory turtles i used scraps of yarn i had laying around yarn needle for sewing poly-fil scissors 2 buttons black puff paint optional sewing needle and thread stitch library single_crochet= single_crochet half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet mc= magic_ring st = stitch slip_stitch= slip_stitch chain= chain sts= stitches increase= increase decrease= decrease fo= fasten_off notes for baby turtle belly s you need to make 2 of each color i made 9 sets of turtles make as many as you like for the mama turtle if you make less than 9 sets she won t look as stuffed for the baby turtles i used black puff paint if you don t want to use puff paint you can embroider or use felt instead you will use the same colors from the baby turtle belly s for the mamas shell for the shell please read before starting to understand how to join mama turtle comes out about 15 inches long 14 inches wide babies are about 3 ½- 4 inches long page 1 baby turtles belly 4mm hook green
